entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
